assetProfile.address1: Salmiya – Block 4 – Salem Al Mubarak Street
assetProfile.address2: ATC Tower opposite Laila Tower P.O.Box: 44558
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Advanced Technology Company K.S.C.P. engages in the distribution and marketing of healthcare and environmental solutions in Kuwait. It offers diagnostic imaging and radiotherapy products; medical technologies, and dialysis and health facility infrastructure; laboratory and environmental solutions; automated pharmacy systems and modular furniture for inpatient, outpatient, and emergency pharmacies; and OR integrated solutions, disposables and consumable supplies, and disposable solutions. The company also provides disinfection and sterilization equipment; patient care and rehabilitation, and medical furniture; and specialized equipment, instruments, materials, and consumables for dental clinics and labs. In addition, it offers pharmaceuticals, aesthetic products, medical devices, hospital consumables, and disinfectants; animal health, veterinary, agriculture, crop protection, and irrigation products; and wellness products, healthcare apparel, and medical devices. Further, the company provides information solutions, such as hospital management systems, electronic medical records, and clinical decision support systems; and structured cabling, converged and wireless networking, IP telephony, video conferencing, enterprise datacenters, enterprise storage, disaster recovery and business continuity, security, and cloud and virtualization environment building solutions. Additionally, it offers kitchen and laundry equipment, including cooking equipment, dishwashers, meal delivery and ventilation systems, insulated trays, and laundry equipment for hospitals, hotels, catering services, and restaurants. The company also provides security, surveillance, and access control solutions. It serves government and private hospitals, dental practitioners, laboratories, and physicians. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Salmiya, Kuwait.
